description:
PSD to HTML5/CSS3 using Twitter Bootstrap 3 is a simple course that will teach you how to approach your PSD, knowing what you should take off and what you can do with only CSS3! Turn your design into a semantic, valid HTML5/CSS3 website and show to your clients using a free account of Heroku.

Learn how to use:

  • Sublime Text 3
  • CodeKit
  • Twitter Bootstrap 3
  • Heroku
Photoshop
You don't know what you need from your design? Learn to slice your document, what are the images you should take and learn how to follow the grid system!

Bootstrap

Bootstrap is the most popular front-end framework out there and saves you A LOT of time. It's very easy to learn and for beginners, it's the best way to learn from the professionals.

Increase your earnings

Why you should take this course? There are a lot of demand for this type of services! Learn how to increase your development time and boost your productivity!
title: PSD to HTML5/CSS3 using Twitter Bootstrap 3!
